about:
This module is an advanced installation for Zen Cart 1.5.4 and tested on PHP 5.5.17. It may very well work on other Zen cart versions too.
We are so very excited to talk about Checkout Reloaded. Ironically, the checkout modules does anything but reload =)

releases.description: Added Max Rows per page, and refine based on date
Added functionality to pick up ot_shipping
Fixed bug in version key, improved docs
Fixed bug in calculating of ot_shipping and total products sold
Update Documentation, add reports admin page to uninstall.sql

featuresHeading: Profit Margin Report Module for Zen Cart 1.5.4 Features
features: The core module has no core Zen Cart file overwrites! This is huge when we are dealing with PCI certified software.
Allows the ability to calculate profit and refine based on date, also picks up ot_shipping without a JOIN statement.
Saves product cost and ot_shipping so it isn't an issue in the future when the price changes
Ability to update orders that haven't been already saved in the tables this modules uses

installationHeader: Need this module installed for you? We can do that here >>
installationSteps: Read the instructions and tip/tricks FULLY before proceeding
FIRST MAKE A FULL BACKUP OF YOUR WEBSITE'S FILES AND DATABASE!

If you desire to have the ability to add fields via the admin versus the database. Add fields to your admin product pages
  • TABLE_PRODUCTS add 'products_cost'
  • TABLE_ORDERS_PRODUCTS add 'products_cost'
  • Columns will be added during auto-install if you don't add them
Log in to your Admin or load any page in your Admin, the module will self-install
If you want to update your old orders go to YOUR_ADMIN/stats_products_purchased.php?action=update_old_orders
tips: To find a module to add product fields search the forum for "product fields"
Unlike the previous versions this module does not include any CORE over writes, however you will need to make CORE overwrites to allow for additional product fields
uninstallSteps: Remove added columns during installation steps
